name: Digital Dashboard CSV Data Source
description:
The Digital Dashboard CSV Data Source Webble

THIS DATA SOURCE WEBBLE IS VERY MUCH OUT OF DATE AND HAS BEEN REPLACED WITH THE
SMART DATA SOURCE WEBBLE
USE THAT INSTEAD!

THIS WEBBLE IS VERY OLD AND DEPRECATED SO WE ADVICE YOU NOT TO USE IT FOR ANY REASON WHAT SO EVER.

Data Source component for the old version of the DigitalDashboard. Expects to be connected as a child to the DigitalDashboard Webble. Reads text data in CVS format (though not from file).

This is the old (Legacy) version of the "Digital Dashboard" for data visualization.
Legacy Dashboard 2.0 Webbles are about to be deprecated in favour of Dashboard 3.0 TNG (The New Generation) Webbles, so if you have a choice, please use the new version instead.

For more info on how to use this Webble and build a Legacy Digital Dashboard 2.0 App, please see the description of the Digital Dashboard Master Webble.
author: legacyDigitalDashboard
